title: 怎么能默认给予玩家权限
author: wwzzh
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 御炎Roinflam 于 2020-3-25 12:42 编辑 
2293745032 发表于 2020-3-25 12:35
支持所有玩家吗？可以的话代码是什么？
[管理][汉化]GroupManagerPlus——简单的权限组管理插件[1.7-1.15]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-896624-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

下载这个
指令就是我发的这些
后面给权限就行，只能op给

顺带一提，你只装了一个ess
[综合|经济|传送|管理][少更新]Essentials EssentialsX —— 基础插件[1.7.10-1.14]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-619883-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)


下载全家桶

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
你安装了什么权限组插件。

还有插件一般都会默认给玩家权限的

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
对应插件的介绍都会说有哪些权限的，照着给就行

GroupManager权限组/mangadd xxx = 创建叫做xxx用户组
/mangdel xxx = 删除xxx用户组
/manglistp xxx = 列xxx用户组权限
/mangaddp xxx yyy = 给用户组xxx添加yyy权限
/mangdelp xxx yyy = 删除用户组xxxyyy权限
/mangaddv xxx prefix yyy = 给用户组xxx添加yyy前缀
/mangaddi xxx yyy = 让用户组xxx继承yyy权限
/manuadd xxx yyy = 玩家xxx放进用户组yyy
/manuaddp xxx yyy = 给用户xxx添加yyy权限复制代码

replies.author: liu1413749944
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 liu1413749944 于 2020-3-25 12:22 编辑 

加了groupmanager之后
默认破坏权限是essentials.build
主要指令是mangaddp default ·权限·

主要权限
作弊bigtreeessentials.bigtree允许玩家使用/bigtree命令Allow access to the /bigtree  command.作弊breakessentials.break允许玩家使用/break命令Allows access to the /break  command.作弊breakessentials.break.bedrock允许玩家打破床Allows the breaking of bedrock.作弊enchantessentials.enchant允许玩家使用/enchant命令Allows access to the /enchant  command.作弊enchantessentials.enchantments.[enchantmentname]允许玩家附魔[enchantmentname]类型Allows access to each  enchantment type.作弊enchantessentials.enchantments.allowunsafe如果在配置中启用。该权限允许玩家使用不安全的附魔类型If enabled in the config, this  permission allows unsafe enchantments.作弊expessentials.exp允许玩家使用/exp命令Allow access to the /exp  command.作弊expessentials.exp.give允许玩家给自己经验（对自己使用/exp）Allows players to give  themselves exp.作弊expessentials.exp.give.others允许玩家给他人经验（对别人使用/exp）Allows players to give others  exp (if they also have essentials.exp.give).作弊expessentials.exp.others允许玩家查看他人的经验值Allows players to see another  players exp.作弊expessentials.exp.set允许玩家设置自己的经验值Allows players to set their own  exp.作弊expessentials.exp.set.others允许玩家设置他人的经验值Allows players to change others  exp (if they also have essentials.exp.set).作弊feedessentials.feed允许玩家使用/feed命令Allows access to the /feed  command.作弊feedessentials.feed.cooldown.bypass允许玩家无视食物的cdBypass the feed cooldown作弊feedessentials.feed.others允许玩家对他人使用/feedAllows a player to feed another  player.作弊fireworkessentials.firework允许玩家使用/firework命令Allow access to the /firework  command.作弊fireworkessentials.firework.fire允许玩家在手中生成一个烟火的拷贝Allows a user to 'spawn' a copy  of the firework held in their hands.作弊flyessentials.fly允许玩家使用/fly命令Allow access to the /fly  command.作弊flyessentials.fly.others允许玩家对他人使用/flyAllows you to toggle fly for  other players.作弊flyessentials.fly.safelogin如果玩家登陆的时候浮在空中那么会自动开启/fly（保持你的状态和离线时一样）Players with this command will  automatically switch to fly mode if they login whilst floating in the air.作弊gamemodeessentials.gamemode允许玩家使用/gamemode命令Allow access to the /gamemode  command.作弊gamemodeessentials.gamemode.others允许玩家对他人使用/gamemodeAllows you to change the  gamemode of other players.作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.meta-chapter-[chapter]允许玩家从服务器的book.txt文件中生成对应的书Allows spawning of specific  books only, from book.txt.作弊giveessentials.enchantments.[enchantmentname]允许玩家附魔[enchantmentname]类型Allows access to each  enchantment type.作弊giveessentials.enchantments.allowunsafe如果在配置中启用。该权限允许玩家使用不安全的附魔类型If enabled in the config, this  permission allows unsafe enchantments.作弊giveessentials.give允许玩家使用/give命令Allow access to the /give  command.作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.exempt允许玩家从黑名单（被ban列表）中生成物品Allows spawning of items on the  spawn blacklist.作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.item-<itemname>If permission-based-item-spawn:  Spawn <itemname>作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.item-[itemid]If permission-based-item-spawn:  Spawn [itemid]作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.item-allIf permission-based-item-spawn:  Spawn all items作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.meta-author允许添加“作者”元数据Allow 'author' meta to be used  in item spawning.作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.meta-book允许生成在books.txt中被编写内容的书Allows spawning of books with  pre-filled content from books.txt作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.meta-firework允许在烟火中使用特殊的元数据Allow specific meta for  fireworks.作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.meta-head允许生成怪物的头Allows spawning of mob heads.作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.meta-lore允许玩家在生成物品时添加注释Allow 'lore' meta to be used in  item spawning.作弊giveessentials.itemspawn.meta-title允许玩家在生成物品时添加标题Allow 'title' meta to be used in  item spawning.作弊giveessentials.oversizedstacks允许生成超过普通最大堆叠数的物品Allows spawning of stacks above  normal max stack size作弊godessentials.god允许玩家使用/god命令Allow access to the /god  command.作弊godessentials.god.others允许玩家对他人使用/god命令Allows you to god other players作弊godessentials.god.pvp允许玩家在god模式下对他人进行pvpAllows you to attack other  players while in god mode.作弊hatessentials.hat允许玩家使用/hat命令Allow access to the /hat  command.作弊healessentials.heal允许玩家使用/heal命令Allow access to the /heal  command.作弊healessentials.heal.cooldown.bypass允许玩家无视治愈型食物的cd（治疗药水）Bypass the heal cooldown作弊healessentials.heal.others允许玩家对他人使用/healAllows healing another player作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.meta-chapter-[chapter]允许玩家从服务器的book.txt文件中生成对应的书Allows spawning of specific  books only, from book.txt作弊itemessentials.enchantments.[enchantmentname]允许玩家附魔[enchantmentname]类型Allows access to each  enchantment type.作弊itemessentials.enchantments.allowunsafe如果在配置中启用。该权限允许玩家使用不安全的附魔类型If enabled in the config, this  permission allows unsafe enchantments.作弊itemessentials.item允许玩家使用/item命令Allow access to the /item  command.作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.exempt允许玩家从黑名单（被ban列表）中生成物品Allows spawning of items on the  spawn blacklist.作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.item-[itemid]If permission-based-item-spawn:  Spawn [itemid]作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.item-[itemname]If permission-based-item-spawn:  Spawn [itemname]作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.item-allIf permission-based-item-spawn:  Spawn all items.作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.meta-author允许添加“作者”元数据Allow 'author' meta to be used  in item spawning.作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.meta-book允许生成在books.txt中被编写内容的书Allows spawning of books with  pre-filled content from books.txt作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.meta-firework允许在烟火中使用特殊的元数据Allow specific meta for  fireworks.作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.meta-head允许生成怪物的头Allows spawning of mob heads.作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.meta-lore允许玩家在生成物品时添加注释Allow 'lore' meta to be used in  item spawning.作弊itemessentials.itemspawn.meta-title允许玩家在生成物品时添加标题Allow 'title' meta to be used in  item spawning.作弊itemessentials.oversizedstacks允许生成超过普通最大堆叠数的物品Allows spawning of stacks above  normal max stack size作弊kitessentials.kit允许玩家使用/kit命令Allow access to the /kit  command.作弊kitessentials.kit.exemptdelay允许玩家立即获得/kit命令提供的工具Exempts you from the kit delay  feature, this affects signs as well as command.作弊kitessentials.kit.others允许玩家对他人使用/kitAllows spawning of kits on other  players.作弊kitessentials.kits.*允许玩家创建kit目录Allows access to all created  kits作弊kitessentials.kits.[kitname]仅允许玩家使用/kit [kitname]Give access to a single kit,  where [kitname] is the name of an existing kit.作弊moreessentials.more允许玩家使用/more命令Allows access to the /more  command.作弊moreessentials.oversizedstacks允许生成超过普通最大堆叠数的物品Allows spawning of oversized  stacks.作弊ptimeessentials.ptime允许玩家使用/ptime命令Allow access to the /ptime  command.作弊ptimeessentials.ptime.others允许玩家改变其他用户的时间Allows you to change the time of  another online player.作弊repairessentials.repair允许玩家使用/repair命令Allow access to the /repair  command.作弊repairessentials.repair.all允许玩家使用/repair all命令Unlock the /repair all ability作弊repairessentials.repair.armor允许玩家修复所有工具包括已经装备的护甲Repair all also repairs equipped  armor.作弊repairessentials.repair.enchanted允许玩家修复已经附魔的道具Repairing of enchanted items.作弊skullessentials.skull允许玩家使用/skull命令Allow access to the /skull  command.作弊skullessentials.skull.modify允许玩家修改一个已存在的skull（玩家头）Allow changing the owner of an  existing player skull.作弊skullessentials.skull.others允许玩家创建别人的头颅（/skull [id]）Allow creating skulls belonging  to other players.作弊skullessentials.skull.spawn允许玩家死亡后爆出一个头Allows the spawning of a skull,  default if the player isn't holding a skull.作弊speedessentials.speed允许玩家使用/speed命令Allow access to the /speed  command.作弊speedessentials.speed.bypass允许玩家修改speed限制的配置Allows you to bypass the speed  limits set in the config.yml作弊speedessentials.speed.fly仅允许玩家切换到fly speed模式This permission will allow a  player to change fly speed only.作弊speedessentials.speed.others允许玩家对他人使用/speedAllows you to modify the speed  of other players.作弊speedessentials.speed.walk仅允许玩家切换到walk speed模式（正常速度）This permission will allow a  player to change walk speed only.作弊timeessentials.time允许玩家使用/time命令Allow access to the /time  command.作弊timeessentials.time.set允许玩家修改整个世界的时间User is allowed to change the  time of the world.作弊treeessentials.tree允许玩家使用/tree命令Allow access to the /tree  command.作弊unlimitedessentials.unlimited允许玩家使用/unlimited命令Allow access to the /unlimited  command.作弊unlimitedessentials.unlimited.item-[itemid]允许玩家获得一个无限大小的物品[itemid]（根据id）Allows the player to recieve an  unlimited stack of [itemid]作弊unlimitedessentials.unlimited.item-[itemname]允许玩家获得一个无限大小的物品[itemname]（根据物品名字）Allows the player to recieve an  unlimited stack of [itemname]作弊unlimitedessentials.unlimited.item-all允许玩家获得一个无限大小的物品(任意)Allows the player to recieve an  unlimited stack of any item.作弊unlimitedessentials.unlimited.item-bucket允许玩家获得无限岩浆桶|水桶Allows the player to recieve an  unlimited use of empty/lava/water buckets.作弊unlimitedessentials.unlimited.others允许玩家给他人|移除无限物品Allows the player to gift/remove  another player with an unlimited stack.作弊workbenchessentials.workbench允许玩家使用/workbench命令Allow access to the /workbench  command.
第二章：经济类命令

经济balanceessentials.balance允许玩家使用/balance命令Allow access to the /balance  command.经济balanceessentials.balance.others允许玩家看到他人的balance信息Allows you to see the balance of  other players经济balancetopessentials.balancetop允许玩家使用/balancetop命令Allow access to the /balancetop  command.经济ecoessentials.eco允许玩家使用/eco命令Allow access to the /eco  command.经济ecoessentials.eco.loan允许玩家拥有一个负的balanceAllows the player to have a  negative balance.经济payessentials.pay允许玩家使用/pay命令Allow access to the /pay  command.经济payessentials.pay.multiple允许玩家在一个命令中给多个玩家付款This allows you to pay multiple  users in a single command.经济sellessentials.sell允许玩家使用/sell命令Allow access to the /sell  command.经济setworthessentials.setworth允许玩家使用/setworth命令Allow access to the /setworth  command.经济worthessentials.worth允许玩家使用/worth命令Allow access to the /worth  command.
第三章：常规类命令

常规afkessentials.afk允许玩家使用/afk命令Allow access to the /afk  command.常规afkessentials.afk.auto该权限使玩家在一段时间后自动切换到暂离状态（该时间由配置文件设置）Players with this permission  will be set to afk after a period of inaction as defined in the config file.常规afkessentials.afk.kickexempt该权限使玩家不会进入暂离状态（挂机必备）Exempts the user from being auto  kicked for AFK常规afkessentials.afk.others允许玩家对他人使用/afk命令Allows you to AFK other players.常规bookessentials.book允许玩家使用/book命令Allow access to the /book  command.常规bookessentials.book.author允许玩家修改书的作者Allows the user to change the  author of a book.常规bookessentials.book.others允许非作者修改书的内容Allow editing a book belonging  to another player.常规bookessentials.book.title允许玩家对他人使用/bookAllows the user to change the  title of a written book常规compassessentials.compass允许玩家使用/compass命令Allow access to the /compass  command.常规customtextessentials.customtext允许玩家对他人使用/customtextAllow access to the /customtext  command and all aliases.常规depthessentials.depth允许玩家使用/depth命令Allow access to the /depth  command.常规getposessentials.getpos允许玩家使用/getpos命令Allow access to the /getpos  command.常规getposessentials.getpos.others允许玩家获得他人的位置坐标Allow user to get the position  of another player.常规helpessentials.help允许玩家使用/help命令Allow access to the /help  command.常规helpessentials.help.[pluginname]仅允许玩家查看插件的帮助命令/help [pluginname]Manually adds the commands from  a plugin to this group's /help. Name is all lowercase.常规helpessentials.help.[pluginname].[command]仅允许玩家查看插件的具体命令/help [pluginname]Manually adds a command from a  plugin to this group's /help. Name is all lowercase.常规helpopessentials.helpop允许玩家使用/helpop命令Allow access to the /helpop  command.常规helpopessentials.helpop.receive允许玩家查看helpop消息Allows you to see Helpop  messages常规ignoreessentials.chat.ignoreexempt允许玩家查看所有信息Someone with this permission  will not be ignored, even if they are on another persons ignore list.常规ignoreessentials.ignore允许玩家使用/ignore命令Allow access to the /ignore  command.常规infoessentials.info允许玩家使用/info命令Allow access to the /info  command.常规itemdbessentials.itemdb允许玩家使用/itemdb命令Allows access to the /itemdb  command.常规listessentials.list允许玩家使用/list命令Allow access to the /list  command.常规listessentials.list.hidden显示隐身用户Show hidden users常规mailessentials.mail允许玩家使用/mail命令Allow access to the /mail  command.常规mailessentials.mail.send允许玩家发送邮件Send mail常规mailessentials.mail.sendall允许玩家同时对所有人发送邮件Allows sending mail to all  players at the same time常规meessentials.me允许玩家使用/me命令Allow access to the /me command.常规motdessentials.motd允许玩家可以查看motd信息[/motd]User sees MOTD on connect, and  can use the command.常规msgessentials.msg允许玩家使用/msg命令Allow access to the /msg  command.常规msgessentials.msg.color允许玩家在密语中使用颜色代码(&1-f)This allows you to color your  private messages using color codes.常规msgessentials.msg.format允许玩家在密语中使用颜色代码(§1-f)This allows you to format your  private messages using format codes.常规msgessentials.msg.magic允许玩家在密语中使用矩阵/魔术颜色（如&k）This allows you to use the  matrix/magic color in your private messages.常规msgessentials.msg.multiple允许玩家对多个用户发送密语This allows you to message  multiple users in a single command.常规msgessentials.msg.url允许玩家在密语中使用超链接（网址）This allows you to use urls in  your private messages.常规nearessentials.near允许玩家使用/near命令Allow access to the /near  command.常规nearessentials.near.maxexempt允许玩家无视距离限制使用/near命令Allows bypassing the radius  limit.常规nearessentials.near.others允许玩家对他人使用/nearAllows using the near command on  another player.常规nickessentials.nick允许玩家使用/nick命令Allow access to the /nick  command.常规nickessentials.nick.color允许玩家在nick（昵称）中使用颜色代码(&1-f)This allows you to color your  nickname using color codes.常规nickessentials.nick.format允许玩家在nick（昵称）中使用颜色代码(§1-f)This allows you to format your  nickname using format codes.常规nickessentials.nick.magic允许玩家在nick（昵称）中使用矩阵/魔术颜色（如&k）This allows you to use the  matrix/magic color in your nickname.常规nickessentials.nick.others允许玩家能够给他人nick（昵称）Gives you permission to give  other players a nick name常规powertoolessentials.powertool允许玩家使用/powertool命令Allow access to the /powertool  command.常规powertoolessentials.powertool.append允许玩家添加多个/powertool对象Allows adding multiple commands  to a single powertool.常规powertooltoggleessentials.powertooltoggle允许玩家使用/powertooltoggle命令Allow access to the  /powertooltoggle command.常规ressentials.msg允许玩家使用/msg命令Allow access to the /msg  command.常规ressentials.msg.color允许玩家在密语中使用颜色代码(&1-f)This allows you to color your  private messages using color codes.常规ressentials.msg.format允许玩家在密语中使用颜色代码(§1-f)This allows you to format your  private messages using format codes.常规ressentials.msg.magic允许玩家在密语中使用矩阵/魔术颜色（如&k）This allows you to use the  matrix/magic color in your private messages.常规ressentials.msg.url允许玩家在密语中使用超链接（网址）This allows you to use urls in  your private messages.常规realnameessentials.realname允许玩家使用/realname命令Allow access to the /realname  command.常规recipeessentials.recipe允许玩家使用/recipe命令Allow access to the /recipe  command.常规rulesessentials.rules允许玩家使用/rules命令Allow access to the /rules  command.常规seenessentials.seen允许玩家使用/seen命令Allow access to the /seen  command.常规seenessentials.seen.banreason允许玩家查看ban的原因Allows the user to see why a  user is banned.常规seenessentials.seen.extra允许玩家查看他人最后登录的IPAllow the user to see the last  IP address a user connected with, and their last logged in location.常规seenessentials.seen.ipsearch允许玩家查询用户的IPAllows the user to search IPs  for username matches.常规spawneressentials.spawner允许玩家使用/spawner命令Allow access to the /spawner  command.常规spawneressentials.spawner.*允许生成所有怪物Allows the spawning of all mobs常规spawneressentials.spawner.[mob]仅允许玩家生成[mob]Allows access to spawn a  specific mob常规suicideessentials.suicide允许玩家使用/suicide命令Allow access to the /suicide  command.常规whoisessentials.geoip.show允许玩家使用/whois命令时显示玩家的Geoip（当Geoip模块开启时）Shows the GeoIP location of a  player, if the GeoIP module is installed.常规whoisessentials.whois允许玩家使用/whois命令Allow access to the /whois  command.
第四章：管理类命令

管理antiochessentials.antioch允许玩家使用/antioch命令Allow access to the /antioch  command.管理backupessentials.backup允许玩家使用/backup命令Allow access to the /backup  command.管理banessentials.ban允许玩家使用/ban命令Allow access to the /ban  command.管理banessentials.ban.exempt允许玩家设置使一个权限组无法被banPrevents a specified group or  player from being banned管理banessentials.ban.notify在该权限组中有玩家被ban时系统会通告消息Players with this permission  will receive a notification when a ban is set.管理banessentials.ban.offline允许玩家ban脱机的玩家（包括设定不会被ban的玩家）Allows banning of players who  are offline. This may allow you to ban exempt players.管理banipessentials.ban.notify当有一个玩家被ban后会获得提醒Players with this permission  will receive a notification when an IP ban is set.管理banipessentials.banip允许玩家使用/banip命令Allow access to the /banip  command.管理broadcastessentials.broadcast允许玩家使用/broadcast命令Allow access to the /broadcast  command.管理burnessentials.burn允许玩家使用/burn命令Allow access to the /burn  command.管理clearinventoryessentials.clearinventory允许玩家使用/clearinventory命令Allow access to the  /clearinventory command.管理clearinventoryessentials.clearinventory.all允许玩家对所有人使用/clearinventoryAllows a player to clear all  players inventories.管理clearinventoryessentials.clearinventory.others允许玩家对他人使用/clearinventoryAllows you to clear other  player's inventory管理deljailessentials.deljail允许玩家使用/deljail命令Allow access to the /deljail  command.管理enderchestessentials.enderchest允许玩家使用/enderchest命令Allow access to the /enderchest  command.管理enderchestessentials.enderchest.modify允许玩家修改他人的末影箱Allows you to modify the  contents of another players enderchest.管理enderchestessentials.enderchest.others允许玩家查看他人的末影箱Allows you to see the contents  of another players enderchest.管理essentialsessentials.essentials允许玩家使用/essentials命令Allow access to the /essentials  command.管理extessentials.ext允许玩家使用/ext命令Allow access to the /ext  command.管理fireballessentials.fireball允许玩家使用/fireball命令Allow access to the /fireball  command.管理gcessentials.gc允许玩家使用/gc命令Allow access to the /gc command.管理invseeessentials.invsee允许玩家使用/invsee命令Allow access to the /invsee  command.管理invseeessentials.invsee.modify允许玩家可以修改他人背包Players can modify the other  players inventory (remove/add items).管理invseeessentials.invsee.preventmodify防止他人修改背包Prevents other players from  modifying the players inventory.管理jailsessentials.jails允许玩家使用/jails命令Allow access to the /jails  command.管理kickessentials.kick允许玩家使用/kick命令Allow access to the /kick  command.管理kickessentials.kick.exempt防止玩家被他人使用/kickPrevents the player from being  kicked.管理kickessentials.kick.notify当有一个玩家被kick后会获得提醒User sees a notification when a  user is kicked.管理kickallessentials.kickall允许玩家使用/kickall命令Allow access to the /kickall  command.管理killessentials.kill允许玩家使用/kill命令Allow access to the /kill  command.管理killessentials.kill.exempt防止玩家被他人使用/killPrevents the player from being  killed.管理killessentials.kill.force强制killForce player death, even if  event is cancelled.管理lightningessentials.lightning允许玩家使用/lightning命令Allow access to the /lightning  command.管理lightningessentials.lightning.others允许玩家使用/lightning [playername]命令Allows use of /lightning  [playername]管理muteessentials.mute允许玩家使用/mute命令（沉默）Allow access to the /mute  command.管理muteessentials.mute.exempt防止权限组或玩家被使用/mutePrevents a specified group or  player from being muted管理muteessentials.mute.notify当有一个玩家被使用mute后会获得提醒Players with this permission  will receive a notification when a player is muted.管理muteessentials.mute.offline允许玩家对离线的玩家沉默（包括已经被免除的）Allows muting of players who are  offline. This may allow you to mute exempt players.管理nukeessentials.nuke允许玩家使用/nuke命令Allow access to the /nuke  command.管理pingessentials.ping允许玩家使用/ping命令Allow access to the /ping  command.管理removeessentials.remove允许玩家使用/remove命令Allow access to the /remove  command.管理setjailessentials.setjail允许玩家使用/setjail命令Allow access to the /setjail  command.管理socialspyessentials.socialspy允许玩家使用/socialspy命令Allow access to the /socialspy  command.管理socialspyessentials.socialspy.others允许玩家对他人使用/socialspyAllows you to toggle the social  spy status of others.管理spawnmobessentials.spawnmob允许玩家使用/spawnmob命令Allow access to the /spawnmob  command.管理spawnmobessentials.spawnmob.*允许玩家使用/spawnmob命令来生成所有怪物Allow the spawning of all mobs管理spawnmobessentials.spawnmob.[mob]允许玩家使用/spawnmob命令来生成指定怪物Allow access to spawn a specific  mob管理spawnmobessentials.spawnmob.stack允许玩家使用/spawnmob命令来生成一堆怪物Allows the spawning of stacked  mobs.管理sudoessentials.sudo允许玩家使用/sudo命令（强制执行）Allow access to the /sudo  command.管理sudoessentials.sudo.exempt防止被他人使用/sudo命令Prevents the holder from being  sudo'ed by another user.管理tempbanessentials.ban.notify当有一个玩家被ban后会获得提醒Players with this permission  will receive a notification when a ban is set.管理tempbanessentials.tempban允许玩家使用/tempban命令Allow access to the /tempban  command.管理tempbanessentials.tempban.exempt防止玩家被使用/tempban命令Prevents a specified group or  player from being tempbanned管理tempbanessentials.tempban.offline允许玩家对离线的玩家使用/tempban命令（包括已经被免除的）Allows temp-banning of players  who are offline. This may allow you to ban exempt players.管理tempbanessentials.tempban.unlimited允许玩家无视配置文件中设置的冷却时间Allows bypassing config file max  ban time limit.管理thunderessentials.thunder允许玩家使用/thunder命令Allow access to the /thunder  command.管理togglejailessentials.jail.allow.<command>允许玩家在入狱后使用ess指令（需要玩家拥有该权限）Allows essentials commands to be  used while jailed (requires regular perm).管理togglejailessentials.jail.exempt防止权限组或玩家被使用/togglejail命令Prevents a specified group or  player from being jailed管理togglejailessentials.togglejail允许玩家使用/togglejail命令Allow access to the /togglejail  command.管理togglejailessentials.togglejail.offline允许玩家对离线的玩家使用/togglejail命令（包括已经被免除的）Allows jailing of players who  are offline. This may allow you to jail exempt players.管理unbanessentials.ban.notify当有一个玩家被unban后会获得提醒Players with this permission  will receive a notification when a ban is removed.管理unbanessentials.unban允许玩家使用/unban命令Allow access to the /unban  command.管理unbanipessentials.ban.notify当有一个IP被unban后会获得提醒Players with this permission  will receive a notification when an IP ban is removed.管理unbanipessentials.unbanip允许玩家使用/unbanip命令Allow access to the /unbanip  command.管理vanishessentials.vanish允许玩家使用/vanish命令Allow access to the /vanish  command.管理vanishessentials.vanish.effect当玩家使用/vanish时会被视为应用了药水（药水特效）People with this effect will get  the potion effect applied while vanished.管理vanishessentials.vanish.interact允许玩家在vanish状态下使用命令Allows the player to use  commands which interact with a vanished player.管理vanishessentials.vanish.others允许玩家对他人使用/vanishAllows you to toggle vanish on  others管理vanishessentials.vanish.pvp允许玩家在vanish状态下进行PVPAllows players who are vanished  to attack other players.管理vanishessentials.vanish.see允许玩家看到vanish状态下的其他玩家Allows you to see a vanished  player.管理weatheressentials.weather允许玩家使用/weather命令Allow access to the /weather  command.
第五章：重生类命令

重生setspawnessentials.setspawn允许玩家使用/setspawn命令Allow access to the /setspawn  command.重生spawnessentials.spawn允许玩家使用/spawn命令Allow access to the /spawn  command.重生spawnessentials.spawn.others允许玩家将他人传送到他的spawn点Allows you to teleport other  people to spawn
第七章：传送类命令

传送backessentials.back允许玩家使用/back命令Allow access to the /back  command.传送backessentials.back.ondeath允许玩家使用/back来回到死亡点Give this permission to allow  players to use /back to go to their death spot传送backessentials.keepxp允许玩家死亡后保存经验值Allows the user to keep their  exp on death, instead of dropping it.传送backessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/back后进入<worldname>Allows players access to a  specific world.传送delhomeessentials.delhome允许玩家使用/delhome命令Allow access to the /delhome  command.传送delhomeessentials.delhome.others允许玩家对他人使用/delhomeAllows you to delete the homes  of other players.传送delwarpessentials.delwarp允许玩家使用/delwarp命令Allow access to the /delwarp  command.传送homeessentials.home允许玩家使用/home命令Allow access to the /home  command.传送homeessentials.home.bed允许玩家回到床的位置Allow access to the vanilla bed  home.传送homeessentials.home.others允许玩家对他人使用/homeAllows you to teleport to homes  of other players传送homeessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/home后进入<worldname>Allows players access to a  specific world.传送jumpessentials.jump允许玩家使用/jump命令Allow access to the /jump  command.传送sethomeessentials.sethome允许玩家使用/sethome命令Allow access to the /sethome  command.传送sethomeessentials.sethome.bed允许玩家在白天对床右键（更新bed home点）Allows the player to right click  a bed during daytime to update their 'bed' home.传送sethomeessentials.sethome.multiple允许玩家拥有多个home点Allows player to have multiple  homes, or create named homes. Required for 2+ homes.传送sethomeessentials.sethome.multiple.[set  name]允许玩家提高home点数量Raise the multiple home limit to  a setting defined in the config file.传送sethomeessentials.sethome.multiple.unlimited允许玩家无限设homeRemoves the cap on the number of  homes people are allowed (if they have multiple homes).传送sethomeessentials.sethome.others允许玩家修改他人的home点Allows you to change another  users home location.传送setwarpessentials.setwarp允许玩家使用/setwarp命令Allow access to the /setwarp  command.传送setwarpessentials.warp.overwrite.*允许玩家重写所有warpAllows overwriting of all  existing warps.传送setwarpessentials.warp.overwrite.[warpname]允许玩家重写名为[warpname]的warp点Allows overwriting of existing  warps.传送topessentials.top允许玩家使用/top命令Allow access to the /top  command.传送tpessentials.tp允许玩家使用/tp命令Allow access to the /tp command.传送tpessentials.tp.others允许玩家传送他人Allow players to teleport  another player.传送tpessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/tp后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows players access to a  specific world.传送tpaessentials.tpa允许玩家使用/tpa命令Allow access to the /tpa  command.传送tpaessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/tpa后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows players access to a  specific world.传送tpaallessentials.tpaall允许玩家使用/tpaall命令Allow access to the /tpaall  command.传送tpaallessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/tpaall后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows teleporting player to a  specific world.传送tpacceptessentials.tpaccept允许玩家使用/tpaccept命令Allow access to the /tpaccept  command.传送tpahereessentials.tpahere允许玩家使用/tpahere命令Allow access to the /tpahere  command.传送tpahereessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/tpahere后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows teleporting players to a  specific world.传送tpallessentials.tpall允许玩家使用/tpall命令Allow access to the /tpall  command.传送tpallessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/tpall后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows teleporting players to a  specific world.传送tpdenyessentials.tpdeny允许玩家使用/tpdeny命令Allow access to the /tpdeny  command.传送tphereessentials.tphere允许玩家使用/tphere命令Allow access to the /tphere  command.传送tphereessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/tphere后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows players access to a  specific world.传送tpoessentials.tpo允许玩家使用/tpo命令Allow access to the /tpo  command.传送tpoessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/tpo后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows players access to a  specific world.传送tpohereessentials.tpohere允许玩家使用/tpohere命令Allow access to the /tpohere  command.传送tpohereessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/tpohere后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows players access to a  specific world.传送tpposessentials.tppos允许玩家使用/tppos命令Allow access to the /tppos  command.传送tptoggleessentials.teleport.cooldown.bypass允许玩家无视传送CDBypass the teleport cooldown传送tptoggleessentials.teleport.timer.bypass允许玩家无视传送延时Bypass the teleport delay传送tptoggleessentials.teleport.timer.move允许玩家在传送等待时间内移动（不会取消传送）Allows players to move while  waiting for teleport.传送tptoggleessentials.tptoggle允许玩家使用/tptoggle命令Allow access to the /tptoggle  command.传送tptoggleessentials.tptoggle.others允许玩家对他人使用/tptoggleAllows a player to toggle the  teleport status of another player.传送tptoggleessentials.vanish.interact允许玩家对vanish状态下的玩家使用/tptoggleAllows the user to teleport to  players who are vanished.传送warpessentials.warp允许玩家使用/warp命令Allow access to the /warp  command.传送warpessentials.warp.list允许玩家使用/warp命令时查看warp列表Specifies whether you can view  warp list with /warp.传送warpessentials.warp.otherplayers允许玩家对他人使用/warp命令Allows warping another player.传送warpessentials.warps.*允许玩家传送到所有warp点Allows access to all warps.传送warpessentials.warps.[warpname]仅允许玩家传送到名为[warpname]的warp点If you have per-warp-permission  set to true in the config.yml then you can limit what warps players can use.  This also controls what players would see with /warp.传送worldessentials.world允许玩家使用/world命令Allow access to the /world  command.传送worldessentials.worlds.<worldname>允许玩家在使用/world后进入名为<worldname>的世界Allows players access to a  specific world.
第八章：其他命令

其他Noneessentials.silentjoin阻止加入消息的显示Suppress join messages for users  with this permission.其他Noneessentials.build允许玩家建筑Allows people to build when  using permission systems which don't support build toggles.其他Noneessentials.build.break.<id>[:datavalue]允许玩家打破id为<id>[:datavalue]的物体Allows breaking of a block.其他Noneessentials.build.craft.<id>[:datavalue]允许玩家合成id为<id>[:datavalue]的物体Allows crafting of an item.其他Noneessentials.build.drop.<id>[:datavalue]允许玩家丢掉id为<id>[:datavalue]的物体Allows dropping of an item.其他Noneessentials.build.interact.<id>[:datavalue]允许玩家与id为<id>[:datavalue]的物体交互Allows interacting with a blocks  or item.其他Noneessentials.build.pickup.<id>[:datavalue]允许玩家获得id为<id>[:datavalue]的物体Allows collecting of an item.其他Noneessentials.build.place.<id>[:datavalue]允许玩家放置id为<id>[:datavalue]的物体Allows placing a block.其他Noneessentials.chat.color允许玩家在公共消息中使用颜色代码(&1-f)This allows you to color your  chat messages using color codes.其他Noneessentials.chat.format允许玩家在公共消息中使用颜色代码(§1-f)This allows you to format your  chat messages using format codes.其他Noneessentials.chat.magic允许玩家在公共消息中使用矩阵/魔术颜色（如&k）This allows you to use the  matrix/magic color in your chat messages.其他Noneessentials.chat.question允许玩家发送一个所有人都能看到的消息（提问?）This allows you to send global  qeustions, used if a chat-raidus is configured.其他Noneessentials.chat.shout允许玩家发送一个所有人都能看到的消息（喊话!）This allows you to send global  messages, used if a chat-raidus is configured.其他Noneessentials.chat.spy显示所有消息包括超出聊天范围的（为管理员设计）A permission designed for  admins, to intercept all local messages (ignoring the chat-radius).其他Noneessentials.chat.url允许玩家在公共消息中使用超链接（网址）This allows you to use urls in  your chat messages.其他Noneessentials.geoip.hide允许玩家不被拥有查看geoip权限的玩家查看国家和城市信息Allows you to hide your country  and city from people who have permission essentials.geoip.show其他Noneessentials.geoip.show允许玩家查看其他玩家的国家和城市信息Allows you to see the country  and city of players.其他Noneessentials.joinfullserver允许玩家进入已满员的服务器Player can join when the server  is full.其他Noneessentials.nocommandcost.[command]移除名为[command]的命令提示Removes the command cost of a  given command.其他Noneessentials.nocommandcost.all移除所有命令提示Removes the command cost of all  commands.其他Noneessentials.protect允许保护铁轨和牌子，如果没有这个权限那么不会被保护Allows the protection of rails  and signs, otherwise they are not protected.其他Noneessentials.protect.admin允许修改牌子和铁路（管理员权限）Allows the destruction of signs  and rails.其他Noneessentials.protect.alerts允许玩家收到保护提示Allows a player to recieve  protect alerts.其他Noneessentials.protect.alerts.notrigger不会触发保护提示Users with this permission do  not trigger protect alerts.其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.contact玩家会受到近战伤害Player will receive contact  damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.creeper玩家会受到苦力怕的伤害Player will receive creeper  damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.disable不会受到伤害Admin override to prevent admins  from dying其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.drowning玩家会受到缺氧伤害（水中）Player will receive drowning  damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.fall玩家会受到掉落伤害Player will receive fall damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.fire玩家会受到火焰伤害Player will receive fire damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.fireball玩家会受到火球伤害Player will receive fireball  damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.lava玩家会受到岩浆伤害Player will receive lava damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.lightning玩家会受到闪电伤害Player will receive lightning  damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.projectiles玩家会受到抛射物伤害Player will receive projectile  damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.suffocation玩家会受到窒息伤害Player will receive suffocation  damage其他Noneessentials.protect.damage.tnt玩家会受到TNT害Player will receive tnt damage其他Noneessentials.protect.entitytarget.bypass允许玩家成为怪物的目标Allows a player to be targeted  by mobs.其他Noneessentials.protect.exemptbreak允许玩家无视黑名单破坏方块Allows a player to ignore the  break blacklist.其他Noneessentials.protect.exemptplacement允许玩家无视黑名单放置方块Allows a player to ignore the  block placement blacklist.其他Noneessentials.protect.exemptusage允许玩家无视黑名单使用方块Allows a player to ignore the  usage blacklist.其他Noneessentials.protect.ownerinfo允许玩家获取拥有者信息Allows a player to examine  protected objects to find their owner.其他Noneessentials.protect.pvp允许玩家PVPWhen prevent PVP is set to true,  this allows players to still PVP. Both attacker and defender need to have  this permission.其他Noneessentials.pvpdelay.exempt无视PVP延时Exempts players from the 'pvp  delay' option in the config file.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.balance使玩家可以破坏balance告示牌Controls who can break balance  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.buy使玩家可以破坏buy告示牌Controls who can break buy  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.disposal使玩家可以破坏disposal告示牌Controls who can break disposal  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.enchant使玩家可以破坏enchant告示牌Controls who can break enchant  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.free使玩家可以破坏free告示牌Controls who can break free  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.gamemode使玩家可以破坏gamemode告示牌Controls who can break gamemode  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.heal使玩家可以破坏heal告示牌Controls who can break heal  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.info使玩家可以破坏info告示牌Controls who can break info  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.kit使玩家可以破坏kit告示牌Controls who can break kit  signs.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.mail使玩家可以破坏mail告示牌Controls who can break a mail  sign.其他Noneessentials.signs.break.protection使玩家可以破坏protection告示牌(建议给所有人这个权限)Controls who can break a  protection sign.
